Text: These ePubs get "spine is undefined" error
Dammit, I thought I fixed that error.  I'll check it out.
I had that problem on a previous attempt at uploading this, but these work fine for me.  If you somehow got the old one I put up, delete it and download this one.
OK.  I'll DL again.  But this one was the one I did.
I like the write up on it.  Interesting premise.

Thank you so much for the upload, I've been searching forever for this! 

I FINALLY finished the final Pendragon book by DJ MacHale, and I heard these are not only set in the same universe, but supposedly the ending of the final book in this trilogy will blow your mind if you're a Pendragon fan.
